titleStmt.title: A sermon preached unto the inhabitants of the town of Thornbury, in Glocestershire [sic] on March 20, 1697/8
titleStmt.author: Stafford, Richard, 1663-1703.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed in the Year 1698, and are to be sold unto such who will receive the Truth in Love thereof,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in: Bodleian Library.

place.placeName: such who will receive the Truth in Love thereof
